txb_cross_rate.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"editExchRate") and contains(@id,"M") and contains(@id,"Payment") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_payment_specification_parameter.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"CH") and contains(@id,"SpecParameters") and contains(@id,"Payment") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]
